title: Don't Knock It Til You Zeit It 8/3: Carmelo Anthony, Andrew Cuomo, Simone Biles, Biz Markie, Lindsey Graham, Olympics Downpour
itunes:title: Don't Knock It Til You Zeit It 8/3: Carmelo Anthony, Andrew Cuomo, Simone Biles, Biz Markie, Lindsey Graham, Olympics Downpour
description:
In this edition of Don't Knock It Til You Zeit It, Miles and special guest host Blair Socci discuss the Lakers signing Carmelo Anthony, Andrew Cuomo being confirmed as a creep, Simone Biles winning bronze, Biz Markie's star-studded funeral, Lindsey Graham hanging out on Joe Manchin's boat, and Olympic athletes performing in a torrential downpour

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
